com.joliciel.talismane

Interface Annotator<T extends AnnotatedText>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    RawTextAnnotator, RegexAnnotator, SentenceAnnotator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRegexAnnotator, DuplicateWhiteSpaceFilter, NewlineEndOfSentenceMarker, NewlineSpaceMarker, OtherWhiteSpaceFilter, PatternTokeniser, RawTextRegexAnnotator, RegexAttributeAnnotator, RegexTokenAnnotator, SentenceDetector, SimpleTokeniser, Tokeniser

    public interface Annotator<T extends AnnotatedText>
    Implemented by classes which take an annotated text and add zero or more annotations.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void annotate(T annotatedText, java.lang.String... labels)
      Annotates the text provided, and adds the labels to all annotations.
